ttp_template:
<group name="cpu_cores_hardware_version_memory_model">
Model:  {{MODEL | ORPHRASE}}
Serial Number:  {{SERIAL_NUMBER | ORPHRASE}}
Hardware Version:  {{HARDWARE_VERSION | ORPHRASE}}
Software Version:  {{SOFTWARE_VERSION | ORPHRASE}}
System Uptime:  {{SYSTEM_UPTIME | ORPHRASE}}
Memory:  {{MEMORY | ORPHRASE}} MB
</group>
cli_content:
Hardware
------------
Model:                 XYZ-1234
Serial Number:         ABCDE12345
Hardware Version:      1.0
Software Version:      3.4.5
System Uptime:         25 days, 3:42
Memory:                8192 MB
CPU Cores:             4
textfsm_template:
Value MODEL (\S+)
Value SERIAL_NUMBER (\S+)
Value HARDWARE_VERSION (\S+)
Value SOFTWARE_VERSION (\S+)
Value SYSTEM_UPTIME (.+)
Value MEMORY (\d+)
Value CPU_CORES (\d+)

Start
  ^\s*Model:\s+${MODEL}\s*$$
  ^\s*Serial Number:\s+${SERIAL_NUMBER}\s*$$
  ^\s*Hardware Version:\s+${HARDWARE_VERSION}\s*$$
  ^\s*Software Version:\s+${SOFTWARE_VERSION}\s*$$
  ^\s*System Uptime:\s+${SYSTEM_UPTIME}\s*$$
  ^\s*Memory:\s+${MEMORY}\s+MB\s*$$
  ^\s*CPU Cores:\s+${CPU_CORES}\s*$$
